Expanding STEM Education

Posted by on March 03, 2019 · 145 1 min read

I have a big goal - to expand STEM opportunities. I have taken many little steps towards this goal.

The Beginning

It all started when a High School all-girls robotics team asked my brother and I if we would come teach a camp for them. We agreed. The result was "10 Easy Lessons", a complete set of beginner lessons written for the LEGO MINDTORMS EV3 product.>

The Next Step

With every milestone acheived....

The dreams of yesterday are the hopes of today and the reality of tomorrow. Science has not yet mastered prophecy. We predict too much for the next year and yet far too little for the next ten.
To go places and do things that have never been done before – that’s what living is all about.
